23 January 2009

On the 7th of februari 2009 I will give a presentation/demonstration of AutoNessus (old name of Seccubus, FB) for the NLLGG, the Dutch Linux User Group.

AutoNessus released

15 May 2008

I just finished my presentation at the NLUUG conference and it went very well. At the presentation I released AutoNessus (old name of Seccubus, FB) and version 1.1 is now available in the download section of the SourceForge project.
